page.title: 15RECREATION IN IGHTHAM
page.content: At the present time, as far as we know, the sports in Ightham are: Football, Badminton, Tennis, Cricket, Netball and Five-a-side Football. So far we have asked Mrs. Saunders about the Hard Courts. We found out that there are nearly 300 members including Junior, Senior and Social members. Everyone can have a key if they pay a deposit of Â£2.00. If you want to give the key back, you get your money back. The Hard Courts cost Â£16 000 to build. The Sports Council financed about 40%, the rest was made by fund raising. The Hard Courts were opened in August 1983. Duncan Goodhew, the olympic swimmer, gave a cheque towards it. We also went to see Mr.Vanbergen about the Cricket Club. We found out that Mr.L.Chapman is the Chairman of the Club.The President is Mr.H.Durling
